## ShortcutManager.unregister() method

Unregister a key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unregister(keyOptions: Key): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyOptions | Key |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

`true` for success and `false` for failure.

## Remarks

`builtin` keys cannot be unregistered.
